summary: This is a NPC replacer mod for Ysolda of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Yes, I know there are several mods on the nexus that changes how Ysolda looks but I didn't like how any of them look; no offense to the creators of those mods. This is my version of how Ysolda should look like in the game. I have included two screen shots, before and after, of how Ysolda look. [b]Only vanilla contents are used in this mod. [/b]

[b]Note: Please back up your save file before installing this mod.[/b]

[u]Release Info:[/u]
1.0 Initial Release
2.0 Tweaked the face slightly due to using Pretty Face mod by tk tk. Requires Pretty Face if wanted the same look.

[u]Installation:[/u]
Place Ysolda.esp and Ysolda.bsa into Skyrim's data directory folder. Be sure that the mod is turned on before playing Skyrim.

[u]Uninstallation:[/u]
Delete Ysolda.esp and Ysolda.bsa from Skyrim's data directory folder.

[u]Recommend Mods:[/u]
To get the similar look in the screen shots that are shown

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99
Coverwomen by mrLenski (Third Screenshot)
Pretty Face by tktk (First two Screenshots)


[u]Bugs/Conflict(s):[/u]
Not that I am aware of.

[u]Credits:[/u]
Thanks goes to the following individual group/persons:

Bethesda for a great game.
dimon99 for the female body replacer textures.
mrLenski and tk tk for face textures.
author: sierra
